select DISTINCT bp.*,bpb.name projectName,bpph.name phaseName,bpt.name typeName,afap.approve_result approveResult,afa.id applyId,afap.id approveId from app_flow_approval afap LEFT JOIN app_flow_apply afa on afap.apply_id=afa.id left join bidding_project bp on bp.id=afa.project_id LEFT JOIN bidding_project_bulid bpb on bpb.id=bp.project_bulid_id LEFT JOIN bidding_doc_interpretation bdi on bdi.id=bp.doc_interpretation_id LEFT JOIN bidding_product_collection bpc on bpc.id=bp.product_collection_id LEFT JOIN bidding_strategy_analysis bsa on bsa.id=bp.strategy_analysis_id LEFT JOIN bidding_info_filling bif on bif.id=bp.info_filling_id LEFT JOIN bidding_official_notice bon on bon.id=bp.official_notice_id LEFT JOIN bidding_project_summary bps on bps.id=bp.project_summary_id LEFT JOIN bidding_project_product bpp on bpp.project_id=bp.id LEFT JOIN bidding_project_phase bpph on bpph.id=bp.project_phase_now LEFT JOIN bidding_project_type bpt on bpt.id =bp.type_id WHERE afap.user_id=#{userId} and afap.approve_result='0' -- AND afap.approve_result='0'
and bp.status= #{status}
and bpb.name like concat('%',#{name},'%')
ORDER BY bp.id DESC

SELECT DISTINCT bp.id projectId,bp.type_id typeId,bp.project_bulid_id bulidId ,bp.project_phase_now phaseNow , bp.suggestion projectSuggestion ,bp.status projectStatus,bpb.doc_public_time docPublicTime, bpb.name projectName,bpb.[source] source,bpb.province_id provinceId,bpb.city_id cityId,bpb.product_id productId, bpb.file_formal fileFormal,bpb.file_ask fileAsk,bpb.doc_inter_time docInterTime,bpb.submit_time submitTime, bpb.public_time publicTime, bpb.appeal_time appealTime,bpb.notice_time noticeTime, bpb.suggestion buildSuggestion, bpb.go_status goStatus FROM bidding_project bp LEFT JOIN bidding_project_bulid bpb on bpb.id=bp.project_bulid_id where bp.id=#{projectId}

SELECT DISTINCT bcb.id contentId,bcb.name contentName,bcb.en_name contentParam, bcb.is_null isNull,bcb.content_type_id contentTypeId,bpd.value contentValue FROM bidding_project bp LEFT JOIN bidding_project_data bpd on bpd.project_id=bp.id LEFT JOIN bidding_content_bak bcb on bcb.id=bpd.content_settings_id where bp.id=#{projectId} AND bcb.project_phase_id=#{projectPhaseId}

SELECT DISTINCT bse.id contentExtraId ,bse.name contentExtraName,bse.content_type_id typeId,bse.is_null isNull,bse.value contentExtraValue FROM bidding_project bp LEFT JOIN bidding_settings_extra bse on bse.project_id=bp.id LEFT JOIN bidding_file_addcontent bfa on bfa.id=bse.id where bp.id=#{projectId} and bse.project_phase_id=#{projectBulidId} and bse.delflag='0'

SELECT DISTINCT bp.id projectId,bp.type_id typeId,bp.project_phase_now phaseNow , bp.suggestion projectSuggestion ,bp.status projectStatus, bdi.id docInterpretationId,bdi.[type],bdi.[range],bdi.no_reason noReason,bdi.time_range_start, bdi.time_range_end,bdi.common_name,bdi.standards,bdi.quality_level,bdi.price_limit,bdi.price_limit_reference, bdi.price_limit_explain,bdi.file_buy_rules,bdi.file_quoted_price,bdi.industry_influence,bdi.self_influence, bdi.soliciting_opinions,bdi.file_soliciting_opinions,bdi.suggestion,bdi.go_status FROM bidding_project bp LEFT JOIN bidding_doc_interpretation bdi on bdi.id=bp.doc_interpretation_id where bp.id=#{projectId}

SELECT DISTINCT bp.id projectId,bp.type_id typeId,bp.project_phase_now phaseNow , bp.suggestion projectSuggestion ,bp.status projectStatus, bp.product_collection_id productCollectionId, bpc.* FROM bidding_project bp LEFT JOIN bidding_product_collection bpc on bpc.id=bp.product_collection_id where bp.id=#{projectId}

SELECT DISTINCT bp.id projectId,bp.type_id typeId,bp.project_phase_now phaseNow , bp.suggestion projectSuggestion ,bp.status projectStatus, bp.strategy_analysis_id strategyAnalysisId, bsa.* FROM bidding_project bp LEFT JOIN bidding_strategy_analysis bsa on bsa.id=bp.strategy_analysis_id where bp.id=#{projectId}

SELECT DISTINCT bp.id projectId,bp.type_id typeId,bp.project_phase_now phaseNow , bp.suggestion projectSuggestion ,bp.status projectStatus, bp.info_filling_id infoFillingId, bif.* FROM bidding_project bp LEFT JOIN bidding_info_filling bif on bif.id=bp.info_filling_id where bp.id=#{projectId}

SELECT DISTINCT bp.id projectId,bp.type_id typeId,bp.project_phase_now phaseNow , bp.suggestion projectSuggestion ,bp.status projectStatus, bp.official_notice_id officialNoticeId, bon.* FROM bidding_project bp LEFT JOIN bidding_official_notice bon on bon.id=bp.official_notice_id where bp.id=#{projectId}
